Overview
========

We present two numerical algorithm aimed at high performance computing of Hankel transforms of Transverse Momentum Distributions from the Collins-Soper-Sterman (CSS) :math:`b_\perp` space to transverse momentum :math:`q_\perp`. Specifically, the integration is optimized for integrations of the form


.. math::

  \begin{align}
  W_\nu(q_\perp;\vec{\alpha}) = \int_0^{\infty} \frac{db_\perp}{2\pi} b_\perp^{\nu+1} \widetilde{W}(b_\perp,\vec{\alpha}) J_\nu(b_\perp q_\perp).
  \end{align}

Where :math:`\vec{\alpha}` contains other parameters.
